structure

Class Kinematic

  • java.lang.Object
    • structure.Kinematic

  • public class Kinematic
extends java.lang.Object
    Kinematic provides Kinematic data relevant to a 2D environment and can be extended to provide 3D data and data for Steering if needed.
    Author:
    James Woods

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Kinematic(int x, int z, float orientation, int velocityX, int velocityZ, float rotationalV)
      Kinematic is the constructor for the kinematic variable.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double asVector()
      asVector returns the current heading as a vector.
      double getOrientation()
      getOrientation returns the current orientation in radians.
      double getRotationalV()
      getRotationalV returns the current rotational velocity.
      int getVelocityX()
      getVelocityX returns the current velocity in the x direction.
      int getVelocityZ()
      getVelocityZ returns the current velocity in the z direction.
      int getX()
      getX returns the current x position.
      int getZ()
      getZ returns the current z position.
      double normalizeVelocity() 
      void setOrientation(float orientation)
      setOrientation sets the current orientation.
      void setRotationalV(float rotationalV)
      setRotationalV sets the rotational velocity.
      void setVelocityX(int velocityX)
      setVelocityX sets the velocity in the x direction.
      void setVelocityZ(int velocityZ)
      setVelocityZ sets the velocity in the z direction.
      void setX(int x)
      setX sets the current x position.
      void setZ(int z)
      setZ sets the current z position.
      structure.Kinematic.Vector2D velocityAsVector()
      returns a Vector2D representation that is the normalized x and z for the velocity of this object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Kinematic

        public Kinematic(int x,
         int z,
         float orientation,
         int velocityX,
         int velocityZ,
         float rotationalV)
        Kinematic is the constructor for the kinematic variable.
        Parameters:
        x - the initial x position.
        z - the initial y position.
        orientation - the initial orientation.
        velocityX - the initial velocity in the x direction.
        velocityZ - the initial velocity in the y direction.
        rotationalV - the initial rotational velocity.
